metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2751 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Xen 4.3.x, 4.4.x, and 4.5.x, when using toolstack disaggregation, allows remote domains with partial management control to cause a denial of service (host lock) via unspecified domctl operations.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-system-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
xen-system-arm64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
